narrative.narrative: MNG Airlines is a cargo airline based at Istanbul Ataturk,Turkey. It began in November 1997. At July 2015 it was going from IST to Frankfurt Hahn,Cologne,and Munich in Germany, Paris CDG,France London Luton,UK Tripoli,Libya and Almaty,Kazakhstan. A year earlier it had also been serving Shanghai,China Leipzig,Germany Abu Dhabi,UAE and the Pakistan cities of Karachi and Lahore. Its fleet at April 2015 was seven A300-600F's,two A300B4's,and an A330-200F. It did passenger service using MD-82's between 2002 and February 2006. It won an award in 2005 from Airbus for 100% reliability on the 30 year old A300's. In 2008 it acquired Slovenian cargo company Solinair which it still has as a subsidiary. It has also used 737-400F's before.
